Settings.Name: NPC
Settings.Tooltip: Choose which NPC to display.

Settings.Name: Page
Settings.Tooltip: Choose which options page to display.

Settings.Name: Page
Settings.Tooltip: Choose which options page to display.

Settings.Name: Enabled
Settings.Tooltip: Enable or disable Player General.

Settings.Name: MaxLevel
Settings.Tooltip: The Player character level cannot be higher than X.

Settings.Name: LevelBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Level the Player character to the Party Level + X.

Settings.Name: Downscaling
Settings.Tooltip: Downlevel the Player character to the Party Level.

Settings.Name: ExperienceLevel
Settings.Tooltip: Whether the Player character's base Experience Reward will match their scaled Level.

Settings.Name: Spells
Settings.Tooltip:
Give Player character casters a random number of spells up to X * Level.

The given spells match the Player character archetype from a custom dynamic class-based system.
Works with any modded spells.

Settings.Name: SpellBlacklist
Settings.Tooltip:
The names of spells to not give through Player character Spells sepearated by ';'

Such as:
Lighting Arrow;True Strike

Settings.Name: Enabled
Settings.Tooltip: Enable or disable Standard General.

Settings.Name: MaxLevel
Settings.Tooltip: The Standard character level cannot be higher than X.

Settings.Name: LevelBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Level the Standard character to the Party Level + X.

Settings.Name: Downscaling
Settings.Tooltip: Downlevel the Standard character to the Party Level.

Settings.Name: ExperienceLevel
Settings.Tooltip: Whether the Standard character's base Experience Reward will match their scaled Level.

Settings.Name: Spells
Settings.Tooltip:
Give Standard character casters a random number of spells up to X * Level.

The given spells match the Standard character archetype from a custom dynamic class-based system.
Works with any modded spells.

Settings.Name: SpellBlacklist
Settings.Tooltip:
The names of spells to not give through Standard character Spells sepearated by ';'

Such as:
Lighting Arrow;True Strike

Settings.Name: ExperienceLevel

Settings.Name: Enabled
Settings.Tooltip: Enable or disable Player Bonus.

Settings.Name: HP
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Player character HP by X.

Settings.Name: PercentHP
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Player character HP by X%.
0.05 means each Player character recieves a 5% max health bonus.

Settings.Name: AC
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Player character AC by X.

Settings.Name: Attack
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Player character Attack Rolls by X.

Settings.Name: DamageBonus
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Player character Damage by X.

Settings.Name: Initiative
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Player character Initiative by X.

Settings.Name: Physical
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Player character Physical Ability Score by X, based on its highest physical stat.
( Strength or Dexterity )

Settings.Name: Casting
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Player character Casting Ability Score by X, based on its spellcasting stat.
( Intelligence, Charisma, or Wisdom )

Settings.Name: Strength
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Player character Strength Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Dexterity
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Player character Dexterity Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Constitution
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Player character Constitution Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Intelligence
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Player character Intelligence Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Wisdom
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Player character Wisdom Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Charisma
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Player character Charisma Ability Score by X.

Settings.Name: Experience
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Experience awarded by the Player character by X.

Settings.Name: PercentExperience
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Experience awarded by the Player character by X%.
0.05 means each Player character recieves a 5% experience bonus.

Settings.Name: Size
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Player character Size by X%.
0.05 means each Player character recieves a 5% Size bonus.
Size influences Weight and maximum HP.

Settings.Name: Default

Settings.Name: Seed

Settings.Name: Blacklist
Settings.Tooltip:
Names of the NPC characters to not be scaled, separated by ','.
Ex. rAt,imP,COMMANDER ZhaLk,intellectdevourer
